column4: Hello. How can I change a GPU kernel module version? I nstalled Nvidia's propietary drivers (280.13) but when I try to boot I can't, because it says: "Error: APIA mismatch; The nVidia kernel module has version 270.41.19 but this Nvidia component has version 280.13... So, how do I fix this?
did you mean nvidia's proprietary drivers _on their site_?
They are usually in AMD's site
Aw man.... I am gonna have to burn it to a DVD.
it'd probably be faster than using qemu or vmware, yeah
